bwwExcerpt: As greatest hits compilations go, the new Broadway revue "Prince of Broadway" is pretty much everything you could ask for: shiny, handsomely packaged, and containing all of your favorites. For two-and-a-half hours, nine tremendously gifted Broadway veterans guide us through the highlights of the career of 21-time Tony Award winner Harold Prince, the producer and director known for his work on such disparate shows as "Fiddler on the Roof," "Sweeney Todd," and "The Phantom of the Opera."
